body:
gonna do this fast and simple

so basically if some of you dont know yet my iTerraCubist account got hacked afew days ago, then a day later my laptop bluescreened and stop working/starting up... 

My parents are planning on getting a new laptop but idk when that will happen,
as for my account, im still trying to recover it, but for now ill be on my brother's account SwordArtOnlineII , i wont be as active on the server and on the forums since i dont have a laptop anymore to play on but ill try yo come back as soon as possible, amd heads up my summer ends this weekend and its back to school for me in Grade 10 so i wont be on alot since school priorities come 1st for me and my parents

Anyways ill be back soon!

title: Dont know when im coming back....?

replies.body: Alrighty, but dang dude, your brother's luck in getting that name is insane.
